Title: But for the Grace of God
Plot: Allison tries to help investigator Cynthia Keener find a missing teenage girl.  Meanwhile, Ariel dreams of Allison's high school days from the 80's after  being asked out to a concert without any chaperones.
GuestStars: Jennifer Lawrence, Danielle Hernandez, Andrew James Allen, Larry Clarke, Bubba Lewis, J. David Krassner, Freddie Smith
